attribute.description: It indicates whether the input group should append another component. Default:false
attribute.name: append

attribute.description: It indicates whether the input group should prepend another component. Default:false
attribute.name: prepend

tag.name: datalist

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the collection to be iterated in component
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Indicates the map to be iterated in component
attribute.name: map

attribute.description: Indicates that component has fixed options
attribute.name: fixed

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

tag.example: <html:input name="dl" list="myDatalist1"/> <html:datalist id="myDatalist1" data="${ persons }" var="person"> <html:datalist-option value="${ person.id }"> ${ person.name } </html:datalist-option> </html:datalist>

tag.description: Renders an option of data list
tag.name: datalist-option

attribute.description: Indicates the value of the component
attribute.name: value

tag.example: <html:input name="dl" list="myDatalist1"/> <html:datalist id="myDatalist1" data="${ persons }" var="person"> <html:datalist-option value="${ person.id }"> ${ person.name } </html:datalist-option> </html:datalist>

tag.name: select

attribute.description: Indicates the id for the component
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates the collection to be iterated in component
attribute.name: data

attribute.description: Indicates the map to be iterated in component
attribute.name: map

attribute.description: Indicates whether the component form is mandatory in form
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Indicates that component has fixed options
attribute.name: fixed

attribute.description: Indicates that component has searchable feature
attribute.name: searchable

attribute.description: Indicates the value selected in the component
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Indicates the component name
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: It indicates the name of the variable java to be made available the object of iteration
attribute.name: var

tag.example: <html:select name="select1" data="${ persons }" var="person"> <html:option value="${ person.id }"> ${ person.name } </html:option> </html:select>

tag.description: Renders an option of a select box
tag.name: option

attribute.description: Indicates the value of the component
attribute.name: value

tag.example: <html:select name="select1" data="${ persons }" var="person"> <html:option value="${ person.id }"> ${ person.name } </html:option> </html:select>

attribute.description: Indicates the component name
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Indicates placeholder for textarea
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Indicates placeholder key (i18n) for textarea
attribute.name: placeholderKey

attribute.description: It indicates the value of the component
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component is required in the form
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: Indicates the number of component lines
attribute.name: rows

attribute.description: It indicates a css class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: It indicates a data list to attach on input
attribute.name: list

attribute.description: It indicates a CSS class to the component
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: Indicates a title for the component
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Indicates a title key (i18n) for the component
attribute.name: titleKey

attribute.description: It indicates the type of input. Default: text. Options: button, checkbox, color, date, datetime, datetime-local, email, file, hidden, image, month, number, password, radio, range, reset, search, submit, tel, text, time, url, week
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Indicates the component's id
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Indicates the component name
attribute.name: name

attribute.description: Indicates placeholder for input
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Indicates placeholder key (i18n) for textarea
attribute.name: placeholderKey

attribute.description: Indicates the value of the component
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should gain the cursor focus
attribute.name: focus

attribute.description: Defines if input allow autocomplete previous input date.Default false
attribute.name: autocomplete

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component is required within a form
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: It indicates the pattern to be followed in a particular field
attribute.name: pattern

attribute.description: It indicates whether the component should be disabled. Default: false
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Indicates the maximum number of characters to be filled
attribute.name: maxLength

attribute.description: Indicates the maximum value for input
attribute.name: max

attribute.description: Indicates the minimum value for input
attribute.name: min

attribute.description: Indicates the step increment number
attribute.name: step

attribute.description: Indicates if (radio, checkbox) if the component should be marked
attribute.name: checked

attribute.description: Indicates whether the component supports multiple inputs
attribute.name: multiple

attribute.description: Indicates which extensions supported in the case (file)
attribute.name: accept
